media-4389090.alt: A diagram showing the operation of this function. There are three rows. The top row represents the input vectors, A and B, with three boxes of each. The middle row represents the operation as three boxes with plus signs. The bottom row represents the output vector C as three boxes. The diagram has connecting lines from the input vectors to the operation, and from the operation to the output vectors.
